entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: httpsys-encoded-url #61478
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #61477
  • Auth pages with auto render mode in blazor #61476
  • Add Timer To Login Page In Blazor #61475
  • Support of \r\n characters in HTTP Headers as per HTTP 1.1 as per RFC 2616 sec 2.2 #61472
  • OpenApi doc is not generated at build time #61471

Closed

  • MVC View not found when deploying to Azure with Azure DevOps pipeline since SDK 8.0.200 #56298
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop #61469

PullRequests

Created

  • Updated CustomPolicyProvider to DotNet10 Style Project #61474
    community-contribution, area-security

Merged

  • Resolve NU1510 as System.Net.ServerSentEvents is inbox now #61467
    area-signalr, 10.0-preview4

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged not fired on iOS #28961
  • Change Font in ShellContent TabbedPages #28960
  • Maui Blazor fails loading files with spaces in it on Windows #28959

Closed

  • [BUG] MultiTrigger Conditions all conditions must be true according to docs but that is not the observed behavior #13280
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing]Fix some Flaky UI tests that fails on android #28956
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Header/Footer Feature #28938
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Improve iOS CarouselView performance #28955
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [inflight][Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28953
    community ✨
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR7
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warn when enum uses 0 for success and default value may cause logic bugs #78138
  • error CS8945 when using `InterpolatedStringHandlerArgument` with new `extension` block #78137
  • Changing signature failed in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Symbols.SymbolExtensions.EnsureVbSymbolOrNothing[ #78136
  • C# 14 Preview 3 massive errors for nested functional extensions #78135

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Start moving workspace events to fire on background threads #78134
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Move ICodeFixService back to Features layer #78132
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add generic log message to avoid lambda allocations. #78128
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unused code fix methods #78133
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Fix razor analyzer loading #78116
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue #70183: adjust the plural for expression collection #78110
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Extensions: nullability analysis for invocations and method groups #78080
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Loosen casting requirements on switch expression conversion #77139
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Memory leak with `System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter` when not disposed #114601
  • Unbounded memory leak from DependencyInjectionEventSource #114599

Closed

  • Failed to AOT compile aot-instances.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 134 #110003
    9.0.x
  • System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` produces invalid pdb #110096
    9.0.x
  • TCP FastOpen does not work in some Linux .NET binaries #110560
    9.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • `ProviderAliasAttribute` type name reference changed from plain string to type safe expression #114607
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • WIP: `ProviderAliasAttribute` moved to `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions` solution. #114606
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Undo a few JIT layout workarounds #114605
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Apply format patch in lsraarm64.cpp #114603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't allow retyping of casts containing a memory load #114602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use [UN]INSTALL_MANAGED_EXCEPTION_DISPATCHER_EX to backpatch CallDescrWorkerInternal SEH record on x86/funclets #114600
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deref pointer in minipal/time #114598
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Mark InlineArrays as NonVersionable #114590
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • Remove a few more instances of unsafe code in STJ #114490
    area-System.Text.Json, reduce-unsafe

Updated

  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add long/ulong->float cast helpers #114597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support W3C Propagator #114583
    breaking-change, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • [S.T.J] Removed unused field in JsonProperty #114071
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • HybridCache: add net10 HybridCache zero-alloc fetch API #114427
    api-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [release/9.0][wasm][interpreter] Fix PackedSimd interpreter intrinsics #114218
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2686245 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Micro optimizations to improve the performance of EH stackwalking, particularly in the X86 with Funclets model #114582
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix IsVNConstantBound assert #114486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
